plugin.author: Takamitsu Endo
plugin.name: TrapezoidSynth
plugin.description: TrapezoidSynth is a monophonic synthesizer equipped with 2 trapezoid oscillator. Trapezoid oscillator is based on PTR (Polynomial Transition Regions) and it has a drawback that increasing noise at high frequency. Therefore 8 times oversampled. 2 pitch shifters are added to make some chord.
